snippet: Varvara Lepchenko, who never advanced beyond the second round of any previous Grand Slam tournament, moved into the fourth round Saturday by defeating Francesca Schiavone.
abstract: Unheralded American Varvara Lepchenko, who never advanced beyond the second round of any previous Grand Slam tournament, moves into the fourth round at the French Open by defeating 2010 Open champ Francesca Schiavone.
lead_paragraph: Varvara Lepchenko, who never advanced beyond the second round of any previous Grand Slam tournament, moved into the fourth round Saturday by defeating Francesca Schiavone.

headline.seo: Lepchenko Beats Schiavone to Reach Round of 16 at French Open
headline.main: Lepchenko Continues Surprising Run to Round of 16
headline.print_headline: Unheralded American Continues Run to the Round of 16
